title: Additional FSI over and above basic permissible FSI of respective land use zones as mentioned in Chapter 6 may be permitted on the payment of premium as may be decided by the Govt
clause_text: Additional FSI over and above basic permissible FSI of respective land use zones as mentioned in Chapter 6 may be permitted on the payment of premium as may be decided by the Govt. from time to time.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Additional FSI over and above basic permissible FSI of respective land use zones as mentioned in Chapter 6 may be permitted on the payment of premium as may be decided by the Govt. from time to time.
